id.description: The unique identifier of the article

created_at.description: The date and time when the article was created

body_html.description: The HTML content of the article body

blog_id.description: The unique identifier of the blog to which the article belongs

author.description: The name of the author of the article

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the article

published_at.description: The date and time when the article was published

updated_at.description: The date and time when the article was last updated

summary_html.description: A summary or excerpt of the article content in HTML format

template_suffix.description: The suffix of the template used for the article

handle.description: The unique URL path segment for the article

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the article in the GraphQL Admin API

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the article is published

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the article was deleted

deleted_message.description: Message related to the deletion of the article

deleted_description.description: Description of the reason for article deletion
